channel.title: Project DS | Complete remake | Complete Build! | Daily updates | Live demo!
channel.description:
[center][b]Hello and welcome too project DS development team thread![/b][/center]
It's been a very long time since I last sat down and thought of making a runescape private server, since finding out the old runescape 2007 server is back online I have enjoyed quite a few hours gameplay on the official game.. but still something lacks with the game, maybe imagination and development?! Well here's what I have planned!
[b]The plan[/b] The plan is too build up my server again, there is literally nothing added too the source I made a few years ago.. a old project I didn't have time for anymore. Luckily till now! So I have lots of work in progress before the server goes up for live demos! But combat will be the first thing remastered along with building a small world for players too start their journey. The world will much be build like runescape eventually, and this is why I want the live demo too be online when this happens, I am not looking for a major succesful server, but I'd like too play runescape (as runescape is) but with more development than what Jagex are doing with their OSRS server, adding what people actually want in the game!
[b]The Crew[/b] I am looking for a number of things, mainly for the website and graphics side of things but I will accept anyone who wants too help client sided also. Server sided will remain just in my hand as I really do not want anyone to leech this is future.
[i]Graphics Designers[/i] Will probably need too complete tasks given fairly quickly, we will want a number of different banners and buttons for client and website. You will also be responsible for taking screen shots of anything needed for forum posts.
[i]Website/Forum designers[/i] You will be in charge of the complete website, from the frontpage too the main forum itself. I will also like SQL experience as I will be adding a Database too the server for highscores sometime in the future
[b]How do I apply?[/b] Simple! Just post below with any relevant information you may think is helpful, please provide a sample of your work.
[b][u]Work I've done today (21/09/2014)[/u][/b] [center] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/ou9o51.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/241p46r.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/28cknid.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: Project DS | Complete remake | Complete Build! | Daily updates | Live demo!

@IRPanic wrote:

[center]Hello and welcome too project DS development team thread![/center]

It’s been a very long time since I last sat down and thought of making a runescape private server, since finding out the old runescape 2007 server is back online I have enjoyed quite a few hours gameplay on the official game… but still something lacks with the game, maybe imagination and development?! Well here’s what I have planned!

The plan
The plan is too build up my server again, there is literally nothing added too the source I made a few years ago… a old project I didn’t have time for anymore. Luckily till now! So I have lots of work in progress before the server goes up for live demos! But combat will be the first thing remastered along with building a small world for players too start their journey. The world will much be build like runescape eventually, and this is why I want the live demo too be online when this happens, I am not looking for a major succesful server, but I’d like too play runescape (as runescape is) but with more development than what Jagex are doing with their OSRS server, adding what people actually want in the game!

The Crew
I am looking for a number of things, mainly for the website and graphics side of things but I will accept anyone who wants too help client sided also. Server sided will remain just in my hand as I really do not want anyone to leech this is future.

Graphics Designers
Will probably need too complete tasks given fairly quickly, we will want a number of different banners and buttons for client and website. You will also be responsible for taking screen shots of anything needed for forum posts.

Website/Forum designers
You will be in charge of the complete website, from the frontpage too the main forum itself. I will also like SQL experience as I will be adding a Database too the server for highscores sometime in the future

How do I apply?
Simple! Just post below with any relevant information you may think is helpful, please provide a sample of your work.
